alert.restartAlert: Restart the app to take effect</br>
alert.updateStartedAlert: Update started, to view the download progress, please see at taskbar
alert.windowsOnlyAlert: Downloading updates is only availiable in Windows, now opening release page of EAF in browser

ui.nothingSelected: Select any of the operations from the left to start.
ui.unlockAlertMsg: This operation needs bootloader to be unlocked first.

update.noUpdates: You are at the latest version
update.deprecated: Now, new versions will be downloaded and installed automatically.
update.updateComplete: Update progress will be completed after closing the app

tips.boot:
Why to use “boot a image” instead of “flash image to partition”?

“boot a image” only downloads image to RAM, so the third-party recovery image won't replace the original ones.
